FAST & FURIOUS 6.actors: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson
FAST & FURIOUS 6.content: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

GONE GIRL.actors: Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike, Neil Patrick Harris
GONE GIRL.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 64 wins & 188 nominations total
GONE GIRL.content: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

CAT.actors: Randeep Hooda, Abhishant Rana, Suvinder Vicky
CAT.content: A former police informant is forced to become an informant again to save the life of his brother, which forces him to come to terms with his dark past.

LITTLE WOMEN.actors: Saoirse Ronan, Emma Watson, Florence Pugh
LITTLE WOMEN.content: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

SPEED.actors: Keanu Reeves, Dennis Hopper, Sandra Bullock
SPEED.content: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.
